sentences.en: Bob ordered brigade HQ to embark.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃命令旅指挥部登船。

sentences.en: By the time the fire - brigade arrived the fire had burnt ( itself ) out.
sentences.cn: 消防队赶到时火已经熄灭了.

sentences.en: Get everyone out and call the fire brigade.
sentences.cn: 把所有人疏散出去，打电话叫消防队。

sentences.en: He successively held the posts of brigade and army commander.
New York has followed the example of Paris in establishing a brigade of police - dogs.
sentences.cn: 纽约已效仿巴黎的做法建立了一支警犬队.

sentences.en: New York has followed the example of Paris in establishing a brigade of police dogs.
sentences.cn: 纽约已仿照巴黎的做法建立了一支警犬队.

sentences.en: On hearing the alarm the fire brigade rushed to the scene.
Opposite the farm tool factory is the office of the production brigade.
Our brigade will be committed at dawn.
sentences.cn: 我们旅黎明就要投入战斗.

sentences.en: Snowmobile brigades delivered food and medicine.
sentences.cn: 雪车队送来了食物和药品。

sentences.en: The fire brigade should always be called out to a house fire.
sentences.cn: 一旦房屋失火，就应该马上叫消防队来。

sentences.en: The fire brigade was called out twice last night.
They fought in the same brigade during the war.
sentences.cn: 战争中,他们在同一旅作战.

sentences.en: to call out the fire brigade
To call the police, an ambulance or the fire brigade dial 999 and the operator will connect you.
sentences.cn: 呼叫警察、救护车或消防队，请拨打999，接线员会为您接通电话。

sentences.en: We gave the gate money to the St John Ambulance brigade.
sentences.cn: 我们将门票收入都捐给了圣约翰急救队。

trans.tran_en: a large group of soldiers forming part of an army
